name: GDS210 Prototype One: Pyrrhic Victory
description:
!!!WARNING!!!
THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE!
I WON'T REPEAT THIS!
!!!WARNING!!!

This game was created by Trent H, Karan, and Jesse A.
This game was created to fit the brief for a project at SAE University Melbourne.

We were given the theme 'Pyrrhic Victory,' named after Pyrrhus of Epirus, a Greek king who fought the Romans at the Battle of Heraclea, and suffered huge casualties to the point his victory that it was practically a defeat.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Mouse Movement - Camera Control

GUIDE:

- The player must collect the green cubes, and avoid the red spikes.
- The player must reach the top of the platforms to win.

KNOWN ISSUES:

- When you lose all resources, the character spasms and gravity no longer applies.

(There's no UI nor a final end screen.)
